name: Darkness Prevails
description:
You have just moved into your new house, it is late you experience things you have never before seen. you find out about a murder in the very house you live in. dark secrets unveil about the murder. in the house a woman was brutally murdered by a mysterious axe killer, you did not know this before but he haunts his victims from the dark before murdering them so be warned the light is your best friend, do not let the darkness prevail...                         

WARNING, This is my first solo project so expect bugs. The game is not yet completed and i apologise for the game being too short. If you experience any bugs put a comment to help me fix it.

GENRE, Physiological horror. 

This games has jump scares and plays with your mind.
